name: Martians Buy Bananas
description:
It's just a means to an end really. A simple and easy job to pay the bills. You just try and keep your head down and not to get roped up in a million year intergalactic war.

Created for NaNoRen 2023

All original assets and story created by Hallie Ivey

P.S Sorry about Jo. He got a little... scary.
